name: Dog Bulldozer
description:
You're a scientist inside the zombie apocalypse.

But you're not Gordon Freeman, you have no crowbar, no gun, no rocket, no weapon.

All you have is a laser pointer, and your pet giant mutated lovely dog.

Use the pointer to guide your dog run over the dead.

Protect yourself, don't worry about the puppy, he can take care of himself better than you.
